title: Results of Milgram obedience study suggested...

content.prompt: The results of studies on obedience suggest which of the following?

choices.label: Obedient people are unable to empathize with others.
Most people will not physically harm others even if ordered to do so.
Most people will obey perceived authority figuresâ€™ instructions to harm others.
People usually obey their consciences when allowed to decide whether to follow orders.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
